name: TerraBall
description:
TerraBall is a puzzle which looks like a cross over between Brick Breaker & Mini golf set in the grand scale of Nature.

Get into an adventure of 14 levels which harbor the scale of "nature".
Sincerely hope you'll have a good time playing the game.

Game made by : 

Igor Le Bis Gauthier : Game designer / Level designer / Developer

Also assisted by :
 
Axel Fazer: Developer

Matthias Bronner: QA 

*TBN if you have any issue press R to reload the current level
Feel free to share your feedbacks down below, its always appreciated!
